cloudsql.use_proxy: <true if set up to use proxy db connection>

postprocess_keypath.postproc_file_name_key_null_update: update %s set file_name_key = null where project_short_name = '%s' and data_type = '%s'
postprocess_keypath.postproc_file_uploaded_update: update %s set file_uploaded = 'true' where file_name_key is not null and data_type in ('Biospecimen Supplement', 'Clinical Supplement', 'Aligned Reads', 'Diagnostic image', 'Tissue slide image', 'Genotypes', 'Aligned reads', 'Simple nucleotide variation')

stmts: INSERT INTO TCGA_metadata_samples (case_gdc_id, case_barcode, sample_gdc_id, sample_barcode, sample_type, program_name, project_short_name, disease_code, preservation_method, endpoint_type) SELECT case_gdc_id, case_barcode, sample_gdc_id, sample_barcode, sample_type, program_name, project_short_name, disease_code, preservation_method, endpoint_type FROM TCGA_metadata_biospecimen where project_short_name = '%s' and endpoint_type = '%s' and sample_barcode not in (select sample_barcode from TCGA_metadata_samples)

update TCGA_metadata_samples s left join TCGA_metadata_clinical c on s.case_barcode=c.case_barcode set s.age_at_diagnosis=c.age_at_diagnosis, s.gender=c.gender, s.vital_status=c.vital_status, s.tumor_tissue_site=c.tumor_tissue_site, s.days_to_last_known_alive=c.days_to_last_known_alive, s.person_neoplasm_cancer_status=c.person_neoplasm_cancer_status, s.race=c.race, s.ethnicity=c.ethnicity, s.bmi=c.bmi, s.tobacco_smoking_history=c.tobacco_smoking_history, s.menopause_status=c.menopause_status, s.hpv_status=c.hpv_status, s.year_of_diagnosis=c.year_of_diagnosis, s.pathologic_stage=c.pathologic_stage, s.residual_tumor=c.residual_tumor, s.neoplasm_histologic_grade=c.neoplasm_histologic_grade, s.histological_type=c.histological_type where c.project_short_name = '%s' and c.endpoint_type = '%s'

images.clinical_select_template: select case_barcode from TCGA_metadata_clinical where case_barcode in (%s) order by case_barcode
images.biospecimen_select_template: select sample_barcode from TCGA_metadata_biospecimen where sample_barcode in (%s) order by sample_barcode
images.samples_select_template: select sample_barcode from TCGA_metadata_samples where sample_barcode in (%s) order by sample_barcode

Radiology.bq_select_template: select {0} FROM `isb-cgc.metadata.TCGA_radiology_images` group by {0} order by {0}
Radiology.data_select_template: select case_barcode, file_name from TCGA_metadata_data_HG19 where (case_barcode, file_name) in (%s) and data_type = 'Radiology image' order by 1,2
Radiology.data_update_template: update TCGA_metadata_data_HG19 set file_name_key = %s, file_uploaded = 'true' where case_barcode = %s and file_name = %s and data_type = %s
Radiology.data_verify_select_template: select case_barcode, file_name from TCGA_metadata_data_HG19 where data_type = 'Radiology image' and file_uploaded = 'true' order by 1,2

Tissue.bq_select_template: select {0} FROM [isb-cgc:metadata.TCGA_slide_images] where left(slide_id, 2) <> 'DX' group by {0} order by {0}
Tissue.data_select_template: select sample_barcode, file_name from TCGA_metadata_data_HG19 where (sample_barcode, file_name) in (%s) and data_type = 'Tissue slide image' order by 1,2
Tissue.data_update_template: update TCGA_metadata_data_HG19 set file_name_key = %s, file_uploaded = 'true' where sample_barcode = %s and file_name = %s and data_type = %s
Tissue.data_verify_select_template: select sample_barcode, file_name from TCGA_metadata_data_HG19 where data_type = 'Tissue slide image' and file_uploaded = 'true' order by 1,2

Diagnostic.bq_select_template: select {0} FROM [isb-cgc:metadata.TCGA_slide_images] where left(slide_id, 2) = 'DX' group by {0} order by {0}
Diagnostic.data_select_template: select sample_barcode, file_name from TCGA_metadata_data_HG19 where (sample_barcode, file_name) in (%s) and data_type = 'Diagnostic image' order by 1,2
Diagnostic.data_update_template: update TCGA_metadata_data_HG19 set file_name_key = %s, file_uploaded = 'true' where sample_barcode = %s and file_name = %s and data_type = %s
Diagnostic.data_verify_select_template: select sample_barcode, file_name from TCGA_metadata_data_HG19 where data_type = 'Diagnostic image' and file_uploaded = 'true' order by 1,2

stmts: INSERT INTO TARGET_metadata_samples (case_gdc_id, case_barcode, sample_gdc_id, sample_barcode, sample_type, program_name, project_short_name, disease_code, endpoint_type) SELECT case_gdc_id, case_barcode, sample_gdc_id, sample_barcode, sample_type, program_name, project_short_name, disease_code, endpoint_type FROM TARGET_metadata_biospecimen where project_short_name = '%s' and endpoint_type = '%s' and sample_barcode not in (select sample_barcode from TARGET_metadata_samples)

update TARGET_metadata_samples s join TARGET_metadata_clinical c on s.case_barcode = c.case_barcode set s.age_at_diagnosis=c.age_at_diagnosis, s.gender=c.gender, s.first_event=c.first_event, s.protocol=c.protocol, s.vital_status=c.vital_status, s.race=c.race, s.ethnicity=c.ethnicity, s.days_to_birth=c.days_to_birth, s.days_to_death=c.days_to_death, s.year_of_diagnosis=c.year_of_diagnosis, s.event_free_survival=c.event_free_survival, s.days_to_last_followup=c.days_to_last_followup, s.days_to_last_known_alive=c.days_to_last_known_alive, s.wbc_at_diagnosis=c.wbc_at_diagnosis where c.project_short_name = '%s' and c.endpoint_type = '%s'

INSERT INTO CCLE_metadata_samples (case_gdc_id, case_barcode, sample_gdc_id, sample_barcode, sample_type, program_name, project_short_name, disease_code, endpoint_type) SELECT case_gdc_id, case_barcode, sample_gdc_id, sample_barcode, sample_type, program_name, project_short_name, disease_code, endpoint_type FROM CCLE_metadata_biospecimen where project_short_name = '%s' and endpoint_type = '%s' and sample_barcode not in (select sample_barcode from CCLE_metadata_samples)

update CCLE_metadata_samples s join CCLE_metadata_clinical c on s.case_barcode = c.case_barcode set s.gender=c.gender,s.histology=c.histology,s.hist_subtype=c.hist_subtype,s.site_primary=c.site_primary where c.project_short_name = '%s' and c.endpoint_type = '%s'
